The Score Media and Gaming is a Toronto based sports media company. If you are
in North America, you are probably aware of The Score's sports app, which is the
second most used sports app on the continent, behind only ESPN.

The Score started as a 24 hour sports broadcaster in Canada way back inâ€¦
